description: AWS IAM Privilege Escalation detected. User developer-svc-account attached AdministratorAccess policy to their own account without authorization. The service account which should have read-only Lambda access elevated privileges by attaching AWS managed policy arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/AdministratorAccess. Action performed from previously unseen IP address. Account now has full administrative access to entire AWS environment including S3 EC2 RDS and IAM management.
alert_name: AWS IAM Privilege Escalation - Unauthorized Admin Access
